articles.author: Cat Zhang
articles.title: Billy Ray Cyrus’s Ex-Wife Firerose Is Also Concerned for Him - The Cut
articles.description: The Australian singer, who was married to Cyrus for seven months, says she’s glad ‘the truth is coming to light’ after his inauguration performance.
articles.content: After Billy Ray Cyruss botched performance at Donald Trumps inauguration, his ex-wife Firerose has joined the chorus of people expressing concern about his behavior. On Thursday, the Australian singe… [+1432 chars]
